text: Dillard-Gamble Houses are two historic homes located at Durham, Durham County, North Carolina. One house is in the Colonial Revival style and the other is in the International Style. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1979. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Colonial Revival architecture in North Carolina Category:International style architecture in North Carolina Category:Houses completed in 1917 Category:Houses in Durham, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Durham County, North Carolina Category:1917 establishments in North Carolina
title: Dillard-Gamble Houses
